section.63: Merits of the Helpers in Madinah (Ansaar)

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:The Prophet (ï·º) said, "The most true words said by a poet was the words of Labid." He said, Verily, Everything except Allah is perishable and Umaiya bin As-Salt was about to be a Muslim (but he did not embrace Islam)
